name: The ViewMaster
description:
Remember playing with a ViewMaster toy as a kid? Well what if within the photography wheel were the numbers to a keypad that would save your life.  

Gameplay Prototype Details

  1. You have 5 Minutes to Escape
  2.  Find the hidden 4 digit passcode on the View Master slides 
  3.  Enter the 4 digit passcode to escape

Controls

  1. WSAD - Movement
  2. F to interact 
  3. Left click to cycle through View Master and to place on
  4. Right click to take off view master

Make this into a full game?

Would you all be interested in this becoming a full fledged game. Let me know in the comments!
